review: We love our Fire Stick.  We do not have cable run to all rooms in our house and this is a great way to be able to access quality programming without having the cable company install a box at added expense.  It is easy to install, set up is simple, and it can easily be moved to another TV.  It will be perfect for use when we travel.  You have acess not only to Amazon Prime movies to watch for free, rent, or purchase, but also NetFilx, Hulu and other programs, so options are endless.  I would highly recommend purchasing an Amazon Fire TV Stick.
author: Brenda Jean Myers
